mapper.insert: INSERT INTO train_experience (userId, trainName, trainLocation, trainAwardName, trainAwardTime, detail, index, createTimeStamp, lastUpdateStamp, isDel) values (#{userId}, #{trainName}, #{trainLocation}, #{trainAwardName}, #{trainAwardTime}, #{detail}, #{index}, unix_timestamp(now()), unix_timestamp(now()), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM train_experience WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE train_experience SET trainName=#{trainName}, trainLocation=#{trainLocation}, trainAwardName=#{trainAwardName}, trainAwardTime=#{trainAwardTime}, detail=#{detail}, lastUpdateStamp=unix_timestamp(now()) WHERE id = #{id}
